title: Zyra mains are the most delusional lot i've ever seen
body:
"zyra is balanced"

"her e is hard to land"

"q is easy to get out of"

"she is very squishy"

"muh mobility"

"outplayed XP"

"zhonya's outplay boom!"

"zyra can't 1v5"

"just build mr"

"just qss/cleanse the snare"

Zyra mains use these arguments thinking they are good at this game, but they are just freelo abusers.
